name: Restaurant Management System
desc: Full-stack restaurant management system with order management, table reservations, dashboard, and real-time updates. Built with modern web technologies.

name: Cuisine Restaurant

name: Realtime Chat App

name: EduLink HUB
desc: Educational platform for Bangladeshi students with study resources, expert tutors, scholarship information, and affordable learning solutions.

name: E-Shop

name: 10 Min School
